record.description: View of Shimer College from a Chicago, Milwaukee, and St. Paul train. [Founded by Francis Wood Shimer at Mount Carroll, Illinois in 1853, the non-denominational, co-educational institution became affiliated with the University of Chicago in 1897.] Postcard, postmarked June 17, 1908, [addressed to university] president Harry Pratt Judson.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Addressed to President Judson at the University of Chicago.
